properties.name: passwordHistory.enable
properties.description: User will not be allowed to use previously used passwords.

properties.name: passwordHistory.count
properties.description: Restrict reusing last n number of passwords during password update.

properties.name: passwordPolicy.enable
properties.displayName: Validate passwords based on a policy pattern
properties.description: Validate user passwords against a policy

properties.name: passwordPolicy.min.length
properties.description: Minimum number of characters in the password.

properties.name: passwordPolicy.max.length
properties.description: Maximum number of characters in the password.

properties.name: passwordPolicy.pattern
properties.description: A regex pattern to validate the password.

properties.name: passwordPolicy.errorMsg
properties.value: 'Password pattern policy violated. Password should contain a digit[0-9], a lower case letter[a-z], an upper case letter[A-Z], one of !@#$%&* characters'
properties.description: This error message will be displayed when a pattern violation is detected.
